articles.title: Floral Basket to C.C., WPK from C.C., CPC
articles.content:
Floral Basket to C.C., WPK from C.C., CPC
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was sent to the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the WPK.
					 It was conveyed to an official concerned by Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, Monday.

articles.title: Reception Hosted by Russian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Hosted by Russian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Valery E. Sukhinin hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Monday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister Foreign Affairs, O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairperson of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairperson of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 On hand were staff members of the Russian embassy, leading members and principal artistes of the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting Held
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting was held in Pyongyang on Monday on the occasion of the anniversary of the founding of the DPRK Red Cross Society.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegations of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the International Committee of the Red Cross now working in the DPRK.
					
					 Vice-Chairman Kim Jin Bom and other officials of the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society were on hand.
					
					 The participants talked to one another about Red Cross activities.

articles.title: Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner from S. Korea Dies
articles.content:
Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner from S. Korea Dies
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Jang Pyong Rak, a former unconverted long-term prisoner, died of illness caused by the enemy's cruel torture to the people's sorrow at the age of 75 on Sunday. 
					 He was born into a poor peasant family in Songchon-ri, Kowon County, South Hamgyong Province, on July 25, Juche 23 (1934).
					
					 Subject to a miserable life under the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, he came to lead a worthy life only after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country.
					
					 He joined the Korean People's Army and bravely fought to defend the freedom and independence of the country during the Fatherland Liberation War. In the postwar period he took part in the struggle for national reunification and was arrested by the enemy. He remained true to his faith and constancy as a member of the Workers' Party of Korea without yielding to the enemy's savage torture and persistent efforts to force him to make an ideological conversion for 37 years behind bars.
					
					 After coming into the care of the DPRK he was respected as an indomitable pro-reunification patriotic fighter and awarded the title of Hero of the Republic and National Reunification Prize.
					
					 He devoted himself to the building of a thriving nation and national reunification true to the WPK's Songun revolutionary leadership till the last moments of his life, prompted by his single desire to repay the Party's great benevolence. 
					
					  An obituary of Jang Pyong Rak was issued on Monday.

articles.title: Anglers Association Engaged in Brisk Activities
articles.content:
Anglers Association Engaged in Brisk Activities
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A national angling contest has taken place in the DPRK every year.
					 Formed in September,1959, the Anglers Association under the Nature Conservation Union of Korea celebrated its 50th birthday this year.
					
					 Han Tong Man, secretary general of the association, told KCNA that it had done much toward encouraging angling in the country, helping the working people enjoy rich cultural and emotional life.
					
					 It, he added, organizes the national angling contest in Pyongyang with anglers qualified in each province. It also conducts dissemination of angling knowledge, experience-sharing meeting, exhibition of fishing tackles and others in various forms and methods.
					
					 All the provinces, cities and counties (districts) have their own anglers associations, which involve tens of thousands of members throughout the country.

articles.title: Organic Fermentation Accelerant Developed
articles.content:
Organic Fermentation Accelerant Developed
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- An organic fermentation accelerant developed by the Aeguk Compound Microbiological Centre of the DPRK is popular among many units.
					 It contains various groups of microorganism such as lactic acid bacteria, cellulose-decomposing bacteria and yeast, thus promoting decomposition and fermentation of organic matters.
					
					 It not only decomposes rough organic matters effectively but also is profitable in its production and use.
					
					 The number of microorganism is ten times that of the preceding compound microorganism liquid fertilizer. It is easy to handle as the amount of its application per hectare is less than the previous one and it is solid.
					
					 Many agricultural production units in Pyongyang and South Hwanghae Province have used the accelerant in making Hukbosan fermentation fertilizer, poultry excrement fermentation fertilizer and others, proving effective in the growth and yield of farm crops and vegetables.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon All to Become Heroes in 100-day Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon All to Become Heroes in 100-day Campaign
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls upon all to become heroes and perform feats in the 100-day campaign. 
					 The editorial says:
					
					 "Let all of us become heroes and perform feats in the 100-day campaign!" This is the revolutionary slogan the Workers' Party of Korea put up at present. It reflects the firm will of the Party to open up a bright prospect of building a great prosperous and powerful nation this year at any cost through an all-people heroic advance and the requirements of the present era of great surge for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 The WPK created the heroic epic of the great surge during the Chollima movement, firmly believing in the army and people who are all out as one to go through thick and thin in hearty response to the call of the country, loudly sounded the campaign for the grand socialist construction and unrolled a grand plan for building a thriving nation.
					
					The WPK is now calling on all the people to dynamically conduct the 100-day campaign to demonstrate once again the spirit of winning sure victory of Songun Korea and make a new breakthrough towards the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The Korean people's heroic spirit of glorifying the present era of great surge with epoch-making victories and feats was fully displayed through the past 150-day campaign. The creation of the  "speed of Huichon," a new Chollima speed, represented the miracle of history that could be wrought by the Korean army and people only as they are possessed of high awareness of the era, ardent patriotic zeal and heroic fighting spirit. 
					
					 Only when all the people perform heroic feats in the 100-day campaign, too, as they did in the past 150-day campaign, will the drive for effecting a new great revolutionary upswing rage more forcefully and the revolutionary spirit of Songun Korea racing against time to advance toward prosperity be more strikingly demonstrated before the world.
					
					 The editorial calls on everybody to make every moment worthwhile by displaying intense loyalty and performing feats for the party and the leader, the country and the people so that he or she may be proud to tell about what they did at present to the generations to come.

articles.title: Implementation of Oct. 4 Declaration Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Oct. 4 Declaration Called for
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The October 4 declaration serves as guidelines for action and a programme for independent reunification as it comprehensively indicates the overall ways for developing the north-south relations and achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula and the common prosperity of the nation and the reunification of the country in the spirit of "By our nation itself" clarified in the June 15 joint declaration.
					Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The main idea of the October 4 declaration is to independently solve the issue of national reunification in line with the common wishes and interests of the nation and develop the inter-Korean relations in the direction of achieving reunification.
					
					The attraction and vitality of the declaration has been fully proved in the course of the Koreans' struggle for national reunification over the past two years.
					
					The Koreans hailed the historic October 4 declaration as a banner encouraging them in their efforts for the independent development and reunification of the nation and a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration in all fields and have waged a dynamic struggle for implementing it. In this course they have firmly grasped the truth that the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and peaceful reunification can be achieved only when they positively support and earnestly implement the inter-Korean declarations.
					
					All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should set store by and consolidate the successes and experience gained in the course of the struggle for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and thus turn the inter-Korean relations into those of doing everything in the spirit of "By our nation itself" and those of reconciliation and cooperation in the true sense of the words.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits for Party Building Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits for Party Building Praised
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on October 8 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said that over the past 60 odd years since its foundation the WPK has covered only the road of victory and glory under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK 45 years ago, has strengthened and developed the WPK into the revolutionary party of Juche type and the party of Kim Il Sung, it noted, and said:
					
					 The WPK has been further strengthened into the general staff of the Songun revolution under his energetic and meticulous guidance.
					
					 It is thanks to his wise guidance that the DPRK is now winning one victory after another and dynamically advancing toward the high eminence of a thriving nation, always demonstrating the might of Songun without hesitation and vacillation despite the complicated international situation.
					
					 The WPK will always emerge victorious as it is guided by the great Juche idea and has taken root deep among the masses of the people, enjoying the absolute support and trust from them.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Ethiopian Organization
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Ethiopian Organization
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea released the second issue of its bulletin titled "Mother Party and Kim Jong Il" on the occasions of the 64th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 83rd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 The bulletin in an article said that the Korean people are calling the WPK the mother party. This call would be unthinkable without General Secretary Kim Jong Il, it stressed.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who regards it as his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven, adopted the benevolent politics, the all-embracing politics, as the main political mode of the WPK and made sure that it has been thoroughly applied, it said, and went on:
					
					The plan for building a great prosperous and powerful nation which greatly inspires the Korean people and helps them have the conviction and optimism about the future was provided by
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK set the goal for opening the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea, and is leading all the people to the drive for attaining it.
					
					Absolute and boundless are the support and trust of the Korean people in the WPK holding
						Kim Jong Il as its general secretary.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Marked by Koreans in China
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Marked by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held a meeting in Shenyang on October 9 on the occasion of the 64th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present at the meeting were officials of the general association, representatives of its Liaoning regional association, compatriots in Shenyang and the DPRK consul general in Shenyang.
					
					 Yang Yong Dong, chairman of the general association, in his report said that under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il the WPK has victoriously steered the cause of Juche, while resolutely frustrating the persistent moves of the imperialist allied forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 He stressed that the more than six decades-long history of the WPK is a glorious history in which it has hewed out the unique path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					He called upon all the compatriots in China to cherish deep in their minds the great national pride and honor of being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation and turn out as one in the patriotic movement for achieving the prosperity of the country and its reunification true to
						 Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Extraordinary Observation
articles.content:
Extraordinary Observation
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung gave field guidance to the Oryu Co-op Farm, Sadong District, Pyongyang one day in June Juche 63 (1974).
					 He went to a cabbage field where the cabbage grew well.
					
					 He stepped into the field regardless of muddy ground with a bright smile on his face. Suddenly he stooped himself to see a head of cabbage carefully.
					
					Those accompanying him turned their doubtful eyes to the cabbage. Its leaves had only fine luster.
					
					 After a while the President asked a farm official whether the cabbage had been hit by hailstones.
					
					 At that moment the official was very surprised.
					
					 Actually the cabbages had suffered a slight damage from hail when young.
					
					However, the cabbages were unusually in good condition so that it was difficult to find the marks of damage.
					
					 The President found out instantly the marks that even the peasants and experts could hardly do.
					
					 The officials were deeply moved by his extraordinary observation.

articles.title: CC del PTC recibe cesto de flores del CC del PCCh
articles.content:
CC del PTC recibe cesto de flores del CC del PCCh
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) recibio un cesto de flores que con motivo del 64o aniversario de la fundacion de esta entidad politica le enviara el CC del Partido Comunista de China.
					El embajador de la Republica Popular China acreditado en Corea, Liu Xiaoming, lo entrego el dia 12 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Encuentro de amistad por el dia de fundacion de ACRC
articles.content:
Encuentro de amistad por el dia de fundacion de ACRC
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 12 en esta capital el encuentro de amistad con motivo del dia de fundacion de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (ACRC).
					 A la ocasion fueron invitados los miembros de las delegaciones de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja y del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja que trabajan en Corea.
					
					 Tambien participaron el vicepresidente Kim Jin Bom y otros funcionarios del CC de la ACRC.
					
					 Los participantes departieron sobre las actividades de la cruz roja.

articles.title: Fallecio Jang Pyong Rak, ex preso de largas condenas no abjurado
articles.content:
Fallecio Jang Pyong Rak, ex preso de largas condenas no abjurado
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ATCC) -- El ex preso de largas condenas no abjurado, Jang Pyong Rak, fallecio el dia 11 a los 75 anos de edad a la victima de enfermedad causada por las torturas salvajes de los enemigos.
					El nacio el 25 de julio del 23 (1934) de la Era Juche en una familia campesina pobre de la comuna de Songchon del distrito de Kowon de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur y vivio llorando lagrimas de sangre durante el periodo de la dominacion colonial del imperialismo japones, pero, despues de ser liberada la patria por el Presidente Kim Il Sung disfruto de la vida verdadera.
					
					En el periodo de la guerra de liberacion de la patria (1950-1953) ingreso en el Ejercito Popular de Corea y lucho valientemente por defender la libertad y la independencia de la patria.
					
					En la posguerra tomo el camino de la lucha por la reunificacion de la patria y fue arrestado por los enemigos. Durante los 37 anos en la carcel mantuvo hasta el fin su conviccion y entereza como miembro del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sin doblegarse ante las torturas salvajes y viles maniobras de abjuracion de los enemigos.
					
					Despues de regresar a la RPDC, en acato a la direccion del PTC sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar), Jang dedico todo lo suyo hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida para la construccion de una gran potencia prospera y la reunificacion de la patria, guardando la unica alma de responder al gran beneficio del partido que le presento como indoblegable combatiente patriotico por la reunificacion, Heroe de la RPDC y laureado con Premio Reunificacion de la Patria.
					
					La necrologia del difunto fue publicada el dia 12.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama al pueblo coreano a la campana de 100 dias
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama al pueblo coreano a la campana de 100 dias
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ATCC) -- "!Que todos sean heroes y creadores de meritos en la campana de 100 dias!" Esto es la consigna revolucionaria que presenta hoy nuestro partido. En esta consigna estan reflejadas la firme voluntad del Partido del Trabajo de Corea tendente a abrir a toda costa en este ano la clara perspectiva de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera mediante la marcha heroica de todo el pueblo y la demanda de la epoca de gran auge de hoy que avanza a todo galope hacia dicha potencia.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en el editorial insertado el dia 12 y continua:
					
					El PTC, confiando con certeza en el ejercito y el pueblo que se levantan como un solo hombre en respuesta al llamamiento de la patria, creo la epopeya heroica del gran auge de Chollima, hizo repercutir en alto el sonido del tambor de la campana para la gran construccion del socialismo y desplego el magno proyecto de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					El PTC desea que todo el pueblo despliegue con vigor la campana de 100 dias para manifestar de nuevo el invencible espiritu de Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar) y abrir una nueva brecha en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					A traves de la pasada campana de 150 dias fue manifestado sin reserva el heroismo de nuestro pueblo que hace brillar con la victoria y meritos seculares la epoca de gran auge de hoy. La creacion de la nueva velocidad de Chollima, la "velocidad de Huichon", es el prodigio de la historia que pueden crear solamente nuestro ejercito y pueblo quienes tienen la alta conciencia de epoca, la ferviente pasion patriotica y el espiritu de lucha heroica.
					
					Solo cuando todo el pueblo realiza el merito heroico tambien en la campana de 100 dias al igual que en la de 150 dias, avivaran mas furiosamente  las llamas de nuevo y gran auge revolucionario y se exaltara a todo el mundo el espiritu revolucionario de Corea del Songun que marcha a la prosperidad acortando el siglo.
					
					Todo el pueblo coreano tiene que dejar cada momento las huellas de la noble fidelidad y meritos  en aras del partido y el lider, de la patria y el pueblo para que pueda hablar dignamente de su vida de hoy a los descendientes en el futuro lejano.
